autoSave(address,uint256).details: Can be called by:      - Backend server (after x402 payment) in AUTO mode      - User themselves in MANUAL mode (after frontend approval)

params.user: Address of user to save for

params._usdc: Address of USDC token on Cronos

params.safetyBuffer: Minimum balance to keep in wallet (6 decimals)
params.trustMode: Whether AI needs manual approval or can auto-execute
params.weeklyGoal: Target amount to save per week (6 decimals)

params.amount: Amount of USDC to deposit (6 decimals)

depositFor(address,uint256).details: Only callable by authorized backend serverUSDC should already be in vault (transferred via EIP-3009)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setBackendServer(address).details: Only owner can call. This server can call depositFor and autoSave after x402 payment verification.

setYieldStrategy(address).details: Only owner (deployer) can call. Used after deploying yield strategy.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.amount: Amount of USDC to withdraw (6 decimals)

MIN_SAVE_INTERVAL().notice: Minimum time between auto-saves per user (rate limiting)

autoSave(address,uint256).notice: Execute an auto-save with rate limiting and trust mode checks

canAutoSave(address).notice: Check if user can be auto-saved (passed rate limit)

constructor.notice: Initialize the vault with USDC address

createAccount(uint256,uint256,uint8).notice: Create a new user account with savings goals

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit USDC into the vault and route to yield strategy

depositFor(address,uint256).notice: Deposit USDC on behalf of a user (called by backend after x402 payment verification)

getUserTotalBalance(address).notice: Get user's total balance including yield

s_accounts(address).notice: Mapping of user address to their account

s_backendServer().notice: Backend server address (authorized to call depositFor after x402 payment)

s_totalValueLocked().notice: Total value locked in vault only (excludes funds in yield strategy)

setYieldStrategy(address).notice: Set the yield strategy contract address

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw USDC from the vault (and yield strategy if needed)
